messages.msgSnippet: A few years back we had a pretty active homeschool playgroup going, alternating at different houses.  The kids did a lot of dress up and whoever hosted always
messages.messageBody:
A few years back we had a pretty active homeschool playgroup going,
alternating at different houses. The kids did a lot of dress up and whoever
hosted always ended up with a pile of leftover socks, underwear, etc.
Several of us moms were in the same book club, and we would arrive and pass
the stuff back to the kid's mom. "here's Sierra's underwear" "here's
Gillian's sword". It was pretty funny!

Mary Ellen

----- Original Message ----- and knows which houses we visit that it's okay
to strip them back off when we walk though the door. lol
